text.value: [dynamic(Any)]: The value displayed as text by this control.
text.format: [str]: The format to apply to the value.
text.on_change: [Callback]: The name of a function that is triggered when the value is updated.
text.id: [str]: The identifier that will be assigned to the rendered HTML component.
text.properties: [dict[str, any]]: Bound to a dictionary that contains additional properties for this element.
text.class_name: [str]: List of CSS class names that will be associated with the generated HTML Element. This class names will be added to the default taipy-<element_type>.
text.hover_text: [dynamic(str)]: Information that is displayed when the user hovers over this element

button.label: [dynamic(str|Icon)]: The label displayed in the button
button.on_action: [Callback]: The name of a function that is triggered when the button is pressed
button.active: [dynamic(bool)]: Indicates if this component is active. An inactive component allows no user interaction
button.id: [str]: The identifier that will be assigned to the rendered HTML component
button.properties: [dict[str, any]]: Bound to a dictionary that contains additional properties for this element
button.class_name: [str]: List of CSS class names that will be associated with the generated HTML Element. This class names will be added to the default taipy-<element_type>
button.hover_text: [dynamic(str)]: Information that is displayed when the user hovers over this element
